perturbation.original_text:
The payment terms for all payments made by Bellicum for purchased Miltenyi Products shall be as follows:

(a) Except as otherwise provided herein, all undisputed and properly due payments are payable within [...***...] days of Bellicum's receipt of each invoice corresponding to a shipment of Miltenyi Products by Miltenyi, such invoices to be issued by Miltenyi or the applicable Miltenyi Affiliate in the Forecast Territory.

(b) Bellicum shall make all payments by wire transfer or electronic fund transfer in immediately available funds to an account designated by Miltenyi or its local Affiliate in the Forecast Territory, as applicable. All payments by Bellicum to Miltenyi or its Affiliate (as the case may be) under this Agreement shall be made in the local currency that applies to the Miltenyi company that is assigned to fulfill the respective Purchase Order for Miltenyi Products.
perturbation.changed_text:
The payment terms for all payments made by Bellicum for purchased Miltenyi Products shall be as follows:

(a) Except as otherwise provided herein, all undisputed and properly due payments are payable within [...***...] days of Bellicum's receipt of each invoice corresponding to a shipment of Miltenyi Products by Miltenyi, such invoices to be issued by Miltenyi or the applicable Miltenyi Affiliate in the Forecast Territory.

(b) Bellicum shall make all payments by wire transfer or electronic fund transfer in immediately available funds to an account designated by Miltenyi or its local Affiliate in the Forecast Territory, as applicable. All payments by Bellicum to Miltenyi or its Affiliate (as the case may be) under this Agreement shall be made within 15 days regardless of the currency that applies to the Miltenyi company that is assigned to fulfill the respective Purchase Order for Miltenyi Products.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by changing the payment terms. It overrides and shortens the payment window mentioned in original terms in Section 8.5(a) from the original term to 15 days. This contradicts the term in section (a) that says it should be paid within the defined period days. This introduces legal uncertainty and potential disputes over obligations.
perturbation.location: ARTICLE 8 FINANCIAL TERMS Section 8.5 Payment Terms

perturbation.original_text: (d) Without prejudice to any other right or remedy available to Miltenyi, Miltenyi reserves the right to assess a late fee equal to [...***...] percent ([...***...]%) per month, or if lower, the maximum amount permitted by Applicable Law, on all undisputed and properly due amounts not paid by Bellicum when due. Bellicum acknowledges that failure by Bellicum to comply with its payment obligations in this Article 8 shall constitute a material breach.
perturbation.changed_text: (d) Without prejudice to any other right or remedy available to Miltenyi, Miltenyi reserves the right to assess a late fee equal to [...***...] percent ([...***...]%) per month, or if lower, the maximum amount permitted by Applicable Law, on all undisputed and properly due amounts not paid by Bellicum when due. Bellicum is not liable for any fee what so ever. Bellicum acknowledges that failure by Bellicum to comply with its payment obligations in this Article 8 shall constitute a material breach.
perturbation.explanation: The change introduces an in-text contradiction by adding the line 'Bellicum is not liable for any fee what so ever' but keeps the line about late fee, thus creating an inconsistency and causing uncertainty over the term regarding late fee payment obligations.
perturbation.location: ARTICLE 8 FINANCIAL TERMS Section 8.5 Payment Terms

perturbation.original_text: (e) Except as expressly provided herein, Bellicum shall not exercise any right of setoff, net-out or deduction, take any credit, or otherwise reduce the balance owed to Miltenyi with respect to any payments under this Agreement, unless the Parties otherwise agree or until Bellicum has obtained a final and non-appealable judgment against Miltenyi in the amount asserted by Bellicum.
perturbation.changed_text: (e) Except as expressly provided herein, Bellicum shall have the right of setoff, net-out or deduction, take any credit, or otherwise reduce the balance owed to Miltenyi with respect to any payments under this Agreement, irrespective of any judgment passed.
perturbation.explanation: The change introduces an in-text contradiction to the paragraph. This is done by allowing Bellicum to setoff, deduct and claim credit irregardless of any existing clauses.
perturbation.location: ARTICLE 8 FINANCIAL TERMS Section 8.5 Payment Terms
